transArray.content: The location is excellent. It takes 6 to 7 minutes to walk to the subway station. The hotel is well-equipped with a small refrigerator. The room is clean and tidy. It is very comfortable to stay. The young man named Peng at the front desk is very helpful and enthusiastic. He also packed some fruit biscuits. The breakfast is also good. There are many varieties. I personally think the price/performance ratio is quite high. I will stay in this hotel next time.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road and is at Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. It's great to see your positive recognition of our hygiene in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. We will continue to work hard and continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe that you will stay with us next time You will get a better stay experience. All the hotel staff look forward to your visit every time and wish you a happy life! General Manager: Li Changxia
